title: 菊花賞の後に・フクキタル、開☆眼

text.jpText:
菊の舞台でも大奮闘した
マチカネフクキタル。
text.enText:
Machikanefukukkitaru, who also made a great 
effort on the chrysanthemum stage.

text.jpText:
彼女はその活躍を、神様の力で
『ハッピーの化身』になれたからだと
嬉しそうに語る。
text.enText:
She happily attributes her success to God's 
power to become "Happy Incarnate.

text.jpText:
熱に浮かされたその目は、明らかにおかしい。
心配したトレーナーは、レース間隔をやや
空け、来春の『金鯱賞』に狙いを定めた。
text.enText:
Her eyes, buoyed by fever, were clearly not 
right. The trainer, concerned about her eyes, 
decided to leave a little space between 
races. The trainer, who was concerned about 
the horse's condition, decided to leave a 
little time between races and set her sights 
on the Kinshachi Sho next spring.

coloredText.enText:
mythical carp with the head of a 
lion and the body of a fish (auspicious 
protectors of well-being)
